1.title: Choose your favorite

12.content:
After a hard day at school you decided to relax by playing an old episode of Dragon Ball Z. As you watch the episode you can't help but admire the animation of Goten's character as the kid learns to fly in seconds flat while Videl does not seem to get it. As you get into the episode you start to notice a strange glow appear around your computer as it heats up on your lap as with a sudden flash you pass out.

When you awaken you find yourself not in your house but a green valley with a small waterfall that is cascading into a small lake. As you take in your surroundings you hear something behind you. As you turn around your mouth falls open in shock to find kid Goten landing right behind you. He ask you a question but your mind is shocked to see an anime character before you, as well as being unable to look away from his small toned body as well as bare feet. As if he noticed you looking at them Goten begins to wiggle his toes in the grass causing you to gulp and lick your lips wondering what his toes would taste like.

"Hey are you okay?" Goten said finally getting your attention as he levitates off the ground to hover right before you. Unable to help yourself you....
12.title: Kid Goten

choices: let him pinch your noes with his toes
122.content:
As Goten floats right in front of you his bare feet dangle downward kicking in midair. Rather than answer his question you can not stop yourself as you reach forward and take hold of one of his swinging feet and lift it to your face. Goten just giggles at you as you take a deep sniff of his bare foot as he once more wiggles his toes. Licking your lips you stick out your tongue and run it along the sole of Goten's foot as he shifts his body so he is floating parallel to the ground, making it look as if you were somehow holding him up by his left foot.

After your tongue runs the entire length of Goten's foot a couple of times you lick your lips again as you think about the taste of the foot and how it was even better than you expected it to be. "That tickled," Goten said but does not make any move to stop you from having fun with his left foot. Blushing at how bold you had acted you let go of Goten's foot letting it dangle for a moment. "Ah come on lets play some more," Goten said as he pushes his right foot into your face before ordering you to....
122.title: Licking the bottom of Goten's left foot

orders you to clean between his toes
1222.content:
"You like my feet right so why not show the same type of love to this foot as well," Goten said as he shoves hos bare right foot into your face. As you had found Goten's taste quite nice you followed the order sticking out your tongue and running it in a tight swirl around Goten's right heel. Goten lets out a laugh as he evidently has a very ticklish foot as he begins to wiggle his toes, unfortunately due to the close location of Goten's foot his toes hit your head. Now on a normal eight year old kid this would not be a problem but as Goten was the strongest eight year old on Earth you are almost kicked away.

It was only by actually grabbing Goten's leg that you are able to stay close to Goten. Feeling your grip on his bare leg just makes Goten laugh even harder as he decided to fly upwards dragging you along with him. You can only gulp as you take hold of Goten's leg with both your arms taking a moment to marvel at the muscles under the young flesh before he drops down so that you are now lying right on your back with his feet inches from your face. Goten than....

choices: Goten continues flying around, and you have to suck his toes
Goten lands, uses you as a footrest, and/or shoving his toes into your nouth
Kid trunks joins in on the fun
1223.content:
...."let me pinch your nose!" Goten said, while slamming his foot on your face and squeezing your nose between his smelly, sweaty toes.
Goten then flew upwards nearly taking your nose with him, if not for the fact that you smashed and stuck your face into his feet, and grabbed his ankles with both of your hands, and rapped your legs around his body, that made you fly with Goten, what you did not realize though, is that your mouth is basiclly stuck to his soles, forcing you to keep on taking deep, long, sniffs of the area between the toes, almost causing you to pass out due to it's strong, vinegary smell.
All while goten is flying with his bare feet, doing flips, while you were, holding on tightly and sniffing the toes for your life. You are being suffocated, and as you can't talk, due to goten's sole covering your mouth, you began trying to kiss it, and that caused gotan to laugh, not realizing that he was basicly choking you.
You decided to take even deeper sniffs, filling your entire lungs with the air between Goten's toes over and over again.
So here's the situation, goten is flying through the air laughing and waving his bare feet, as you hung on to it, wrapping your legs around his legs, crying into his soles, and kissing it, while taking in all the smell between his toes for your survival over and over again, for an hour.
1223.title: let him pinch your noes with his toes

choices: I lay on the floor, Trunks get on my chest and he turn into a super saiyan
13.content:
You and Trunks are doing a workout together to improve your skills. Trunks wants to be stronger in the super saiyan stage, while you want to develop more body resistance.

After a hard workout with a lot of punching and kicking each other, both you and Trunks are tired and very sweaty. Suddenly you have a brilliant idea for your workout. So, go propose your idea to Trunks and ask him what he thinks:


"Hey Trunks, I have an idea to improve our training, what do you think if ...
13.title: Kid Trunks

131.content:
"What do you think if I lay down on the floor, you climb on my chest and you transform into a super saiyan? In this way I train my body to resist to your transformation, and you train to make your transformation become more powerful" .

"It's a really good idea, nice thought !!" Trunks said smiling.

"Great, then I'll start lying on the floor."

"Okay, I'm just starting to take off my boots so I don't make your clothes dirty."

"you're right" you answered enthusiastically.
You have always been attracted to Trunks' feet and this was the perfect opportunity to get a closer look at them. You never told Trunks your passion for his feet.

When everything was ready, Trunks started placing his left socked foot on your chest, then he put his other foot on as well, shifting all his weight on you. At that moment you could smell Trunks' socked feet and it was really fantastic - it was a very powerful and warm aroma, due to the sweat accumulated during training.

"Are you ready?" Trunks said.

"Sure, transform yourself when you want" you replied.

"Okay, I just hope I don't hurt you too much," Trunks said, laughing.

This sentence left you speechless, you were realizing how dominant Trunks was in this situation, you were under his feet and you could even smell them.
